item.title: The Great Reskilling: Why AI is About to Change Everything for Media Professionals
item.description: The future of work is not a distant concept; it’s already here. According to the World Economic Forum’s (WEF) Future of Jobs Report 2025, a staggering 39% of key skills required in the job market will change by 2030. While this number represents a significant shift, it also highlights an even more profound truth for the media industry: the demand for roles driven by technological advancements like artificial intelligence (AI) is growing quickly.
